datasource.name: 会议室预约管理系统数据库
datasource.id: 会议室预约管理系统数据库

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  b.booking_id,
  b.subject,
  r.name AS room_name,
  u.username AS applicant_name, -- 申请人名字
  b.start_time,
  b.end_time,
  b.status_code,
  -- 翻译状态码，方便管理员看
  CASE 
    WHEN b.status_code = 0 THEN '待审批'
    WHEN b.status_code = 1 THEN '已批准'
    WHEN b.status_code = 2 THEN '已驳回'
    WHEN b.status_code = 3 THEN '已取消'
    WHEN b.status_code = 4 THEN '已完成'
		WHEN b.status_code = 5 THEN '系统自动取消'
    ELSE '未知' 
  END AS status_text
FROM booking b
JOIN meeting_room r ON b.room_id = r.id
JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id
-- 可以加一个搜索框过滤：WHERE u.username LIKE ...
ORDER BY b.start_time DESC;
